# onWristState

**Type Property**

A sensor that describes the watch’s position on the wrist.

## Declaration

```swift
static let onWristState: SRSensor
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRFetchResult/sample] type for this sensor is [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRWristDetection]

You need to provide a reason to detect the watch position by adding the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSensorKitUsageDetail/SRSensorUsageWristDetection] dictionary to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSensorKitUsageDetail] key in the information property list.

## Reading device sensors

- **deviceUsageReport**: A sensor that provides information about device usage.
- **keyboardMetrics**: A sensor that provides information about keyboard usage.
